sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
thickens
, se tesneje združi ali postane gostejše, kot je bilo prej.

seg.quote: Here the vegetation thickens into a jungle.
By noon the cloud layer had thickened.

sense.def:
To thicken a liquid
pomeni narediti nekaj, da tekočina postane manj redka.

seg.quote: You can use flour to thicken sauces.
After a while the mixture thickens.
